DOC.brief_summary: Three dose primary vaccination 11-valent pneumococcal conjugate vaccine administer concomitantly Infanrix™ hexa healthy infant 8 16 week age time first vaccination .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Children With Different Formulations GSK Biologicals ' 11 Valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine
DOC.detailed_description: Test group : 9 group receive different formulation 11PN-PD-DiT vaccine + DTPa-HBV-IPV/Hib ( Infanrix™ hexa ) Comparator : 11Pn-PD + Infanrix™ hexa Control : Prevenar® + Infanrix™ hexa
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Male female age 816 week time first vaccination , write informed consent obtain parent/guardian subject . Exclusion criterion : Use investigational nonregistered drug vaccine study vaccine within 30 day preceeding first dose study vaccine , plan use study period . Planned administration/ administration license vaccine foreseen study protocol period start 30 day first dose vaccine ( ) end 30 day last dose .
